overview: BoA FIRST LIVE TOUR 2003 -VALENTI- is BoA's second Japanese DVD. It contains songs from her album second album VALENTI and also songs from the her first album LISTEN TO MY HEART. The concert was recorded on the last day of the tour at the Yoyogi National Gymnasium in Tokyo.
title: BoA FIRST LIVE TOUR 2003 -VALENTI-
